manifest.author: patrickozdag
manifest.changelog:
enabled chat filters
enabled redesigned progress bar on the top of the stories
enabled the scale animation while closing the stories
enabled reposting animation and modified some repost related stuff
disabled activity bubbles in feed, now it only appears on reels 
disabled tiktok-like reels ui, because it makes the repost button not appearing
some other changes and fixes

*please enable the "enable auto update" option in the backup library to access the latest features/fixes as soon as they're released.*
manifest.name: Burak's Instafel Backup
